title: None But Jesus
presentation: v1 c v2 c v3 c v4 c v5 c

v1: Though my face were bathed in tears,
That could not allay my fears,
Could not wash the sins of years;
v2: Purest deeds that I can do,
v3: In my ear is mercy's cry;
If I wait I can but die:
v4: All the prayers that I could say
Could not wash my sins away,
All I owe could never pay:
v5: Faith in Christ will save me;
Let me trust Thy gracious Son,
Trust the work that He has done,
To His arms, Lord, help me run;
Faith in Christ will save me.
c1: Jesus wept and died for me;
Jesus waits to make me free,
